task.title: Separate
task.shortdesc: You can separate the selected composed 3D solid into the several 3D solids with the unconnected objects. The composed 3D solid cannot share the common areas or cubage. The separated solids still lie on the original layer and keep the color unchanged. All nested objects are separated into the simplest objects.

step.cmd: Choose Modify > Solids Editing > Separate from the main menu.
Select the solid youwant to separate.
